item.title: ID-36 West at ID-34 - Franklin County
item.description: ID-36 West at ID-34 in Franklin County. Turn right for ID-34 North; turn left for ID-34 South/ID-36 West. Notice the the old and new varieties of Idaho state highway markers (ID-34 North - New, ID-34 South/ID-36 West - Old).

item.title: ID-36 West at ID-34 - Franklin County
item.description: ID-36 West at ID-34 in Franklin County. Use ID-34 North to Grace; ID-34 South/ID-36 West to Preston and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-36 West Approaching ID-34
item.description: ID-36 West approaching ID-34 in Franklin County. ID-36 West joins ID-34 south to Preston.

item.title: ID-36 West - Franklin County
item.description: Entering Franklin County on ID-36 west.

item.title: ID-36 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-36 west. Distance to Liberty, Mink Creek, and Preston.

item.title: US-89 North at ID-36
item.description: US-89 North at ID-36 in Bear Lake County. Turn left for ID-36 west.

item.title: US-89 North at ID-36
item.description: US-89 North at ID-36. Merge right to continue north on US-89 towards Montpelier and Jackson (Wyoming). Use ID-36 West for Preston.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching ID-36
item.description: US-89 North approaching ID-36 West in Bear Lake County.

item.title: ID-36 West (Westside Highway) at Weston Canyon Road
item.description: ID-36 West (Westside Highway) at Weston Canyon Road. Turn right to continue west on ID-36 to I-15 Jct. Continue south on Westside Highway to (Weston) City Center.

item.title: ID-36 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-36 west. Distance to Dayton, Weston, and Jct. I-15.

item.title: US-91 South/ID-36 West at US-91/ID-36 Split
item.description: US-91 South/ID-36 West (State St.) at US-91/ID-36 (Oneida St.) Split in Preston. Turn right on ID-36 West to Dayton; continue south on US-91 for Franklin and Logan (Utah).

item.title: US-91 South/ID-36 West Approaching ID-36 West
item.description: US-91 South/ID-36 West (State St.) approaching ID-36 West (Oneida St.)

item.title: US-91 South/ID-36 West - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: US-91 South/ID-36 West - Pioneer Historic Byway

item.title: End ID-34 South at ID-36/US-91 - Preston
item.description: End ID-34 South at ID-36/US-91 in Preston. Turn right for US-91 north to Pocatello; left for US-91 South/ID-34 West to (Preston) City Center/Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South/ID-36 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 South/ID-36 East. Distance to Preston, Logan (Utah - via US-91), and Malad (via ID-36).

item.title: ID-34 South at ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South at ID-36 in Franklin County. Turn left for ID-36 East; continue straight for ID-34 South/ID-36 West.

item.title: ID-34 South at ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South at ID-36 East to Montpelier. Continue south on ID-34 South/ID-36 West to Preston and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South Approaching ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South approaching ID-36 in Franklin County. ID-34 south joins ID-36 west to Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South - ID-36 East Truck Information
item.description: ID-34 south approaching ID-36. Truck information for ID-36 east traffic.

item.title: Deep Creek Road at I-15/ID-36 (Exit 17)
item.description: Deep Creek Road at I-15/ID-36 (Exit 17). Turn right for I-15 south to Salt Lake (Utah); continue over freeway for ID-36 East to Weston and for I-15 north to Pocatello.

item.title: End ID-36 East at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 at US-89 Junction. Use US-89 north for Montpelier and Jackson.

item.title: End ID-36 East at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 east at US-89. US-89 is part of the Oregon Trail - Bear Lake Scenic Byway

item.title: End ID-36 at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 at US-89. Use US-89 south for Paris. US-89 north for Montpelier and Jackson.

item.title: End ID-36 east at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 east at US-89

item.title: ID-36 East Approaching US-89
item.description: ID-36 east approaching US-89. US-89 is part of the Oregon Trail-Bear Lake Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East at Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36 split. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 split. Use ID-36 east for Montpelier. Continue on ID-34 east for Grace and Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 split. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East - Restricted Truck Route on ID-36
item.description: Restricted Truck Route on ID-36 on ID-34/ID-36 east.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-36 east to Montpelier.

item.title: ID-34 North/ID-36 East - Bear Lake Rec. Area
item.description: ID-34 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-36. Use ID-36 East for the Bear Lake Recreation Area.

item.title: ID-34 North/ID-36 East
item.description: ID-34 North/ID-36 east in Preston. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36. ID-36 leaves US-91 here, as well as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36. Use US-91 north for Pocatello. Use ID-34 North/ID-36 east for Soda Springs and Montepelier.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 jct. This is the beginning of ID-34 north. The Pioneer Historic Byway leaves US-91 and joins ID-34 north.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-34 north. Use left lanes to continue on US-91 north.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-34. The Pioneer Historic Byway leaves US-91 here and continues along ID-34.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East - ID-34 Jct.
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east approaching ID-34

item.title: US-91 North at ID-36
item.description: US-91 north at ID-36 west. Use ID-36 west for Dayton. ID-36 east joins US-91 north through Preston. Continue on US-91 North/ID-36 east for Pocatello, Soda Springs, and ID-34 junction.

item.title: US-91 North Approaching ID-36
item.description: US-91 north approaching ID-36

item.title: US-91 North Approaching ID-36
item.description: US-91 north approaching ID-36

item.title: End ID-36 West at I-15
item.description: End ID-36 west at I-15 north to Pocatello, and south to Malad and Salt Lake.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 17
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 17 - ID-36/Weston/Preston.

item.title: End ID-36 at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 at US-89 Junction, north of Paris

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 17 Offramp at ID-36
item.description: I-15 North - Exit 17 Offramp at ID-36. Use ID-36 east for Weston and Preston. Continue north on I-15 for Pocatello.

item.title: US-91 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 Right Lane Sign Approaching US-91/ID-36/ID-34 Junction, on US-91/ID-

item.title: US-91/ID-36 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36/US-91 Junction to Pocatello, Soda Springs and Montpelier on US-91 N

item.title: US-91/ID-36 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91/ID-36/ID-34 Junction on US-91 North

item.title: ID-36 West/ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: Pioneer Historic Byway/ID-34/ID-36 on ID-36 West at the Bear River.
